richTextConfig.content:
Contact Us

Questions? We Want to Hear From You

We're always standing by in case you have questions or need pointers on our products, whether you need help choosing puppy pads or a pet bed for your older cat.

Your feedback has been central to our improvement for the last fifty years. Please don't hesitate to share your thoughts, joys, stories, or concerns with us. If you're ever unsatisfied with a product, we'd like the chance to make it right.

Check out our FAQ for inquires about tracking orders, shipping, returns, and more. If you still have questions about your order, email us anytime.
